name: castrato
description: An extremely small and fast Javascript mediator working as global, AMD module and in Node.

scripts.test: echo "Error: no test specified" && npm run test:lint
scripts.build: npm run test && npm run build:precleanup && npm run build:dist && npm run build:minify && npm run build:cleanup
scripts.build:minify: uglifyjs dist/castrato.cjs --source-map -o dist/castrato.min.js && uglifyjs dist/castrato.mjs --source-map -o dist/castrato.min.mjs

author: Pehr Boman <github.com/unkelpehr>
